role.argrole: entity arg0 gets around to invest in

example.parse: (IP (NP-TMP (NT 去年)) (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 明基) (NN 企业)) (VP (VV 转投资) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (PU 「) (NN 酷才网) (PU 」))) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (ADVP (AD 同时)) (VP (VV 发行) (NP-TTL-OBJ (PU 「) (NN 酷才) (NN 周报) (PU 」)))))
